text: The Westports Malaysia Dragons are a team in the ASEAN Basketball League. They are based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. They were previously known as the Kuala Lumpur Dragons and Westports KL Dragons. They are coached by Goh Cheng Huat. They play home games in the MABA stadium. ==Other websites== *http://www.kldragons.com/ Category:Basketball teams Category:Kuala Lumpur Category:Sports organizations of Malaysia
title: Kuala Lumpur Dragons
